metadata.title: may cause a panic or an unrecoverable fatal error if passed inputs with very large exponents (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Go, where it attempts to allocate excessive memory. This issue may cause panic or unrecoverable fatal error if passed inputs with very large exponents. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability. 
            STATEMENT: * Since OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 is in Maintenance Phase of the support, only Important and Critical severity vulnerabilities will be addressed at this time.

* In Service Telemetry Framework, because the flaw has a lower impact and the package is not directly used by STF, no updates will be provided at this time for the STF containers.

criterions.comment: buildah is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
skopeo is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
containers-common is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
